attributes.action: allow Northern Ireland (UK citizens) to vote in Prime Minister Elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a UK citizen we are ordered by Downing Street our TAX is used.  We are unfairly treated by no. 10 and we are legally entitle to vote for prime minster. NORTHERN IRELAND is not under the control of the Taoiseach and as such he can not be involved in Northern Ireland Talks.
